mapper.select: SELECT intr_id "id", intr_title title, intr_regdate regdate, intr_public pub, intr_finish fin, mody_dtm modydate, mem_userid userid FROM hr_introduction WHERE mem_userid = #{userid} ORDER BY intr_id DESC

SELECT intr_id "id", intr_title title, intr_regdate regdate, intr_public pub, intr_finish fin, mody_dtm modydate, mem_userid userid FROM hr_introduction WHERE intr_public = true ORDER BY mody_dtm DESC
SELECT intr_id "id", intr_title title, intr_regdate regdate, intr_public pub, intr_finish fin, mody_dtm modydate, mem_userid userid FROM hr_introduction WHERE intr_id=#{id}

SELECT intr_id "id", intr_title title, intr_regdate regdate, intr_public pub, intr_finish fin, mody_dtm modydate, mem_userid userid FROM hr_introduction
WHERE
intr_id IN
${item}
AND intr_public = true
WHERE intr_id = -1
ORDER BY mody_dtm DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hr_introduction (intr_title, mem_userid, intr_public, intr_finish) VALUES (#{title}, #{userid}, #{pub}, #{fin})
mapper.select: SELECT intr_id "id", intr_title title, intr_regdate regdate, intr_public pub, intr_finish fin, mody_dtm modydate, mem_userid userid FROM hr_introduction WHERE intr_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE hr_introduction SET intr_title = #{title}, intr_public = #{pub}, intr_finish = #{fin}, mody_dtm = #{modydtm} WHERE intr_id = #{id}
